connector.description:
Send message to an AWS Kinesis Firehose Stream

Access Key/Secret Key are the basic method for authenticating to the AWS Kinesis Firehose Service. These parameters are optional because the Kamelet provides the 'useDefaultCredentialsProvider'.

When using a default Credentials Provider the Kinesis Firehose client will load the credentials through this provider and won't use the static credential. This is reason for not having the access key and secret key as mandatory parameter for this Kamelet.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink.streamName
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: The name of the stream we want to send to data to

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: Set whether the Kinesis Firehose client should expect to load credentials through a default credentials provider or to expect static credentials to be passed in.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.
